document.full_text: china's long wait for a grand slam champion ended saturday when li na beat francesca schiavone 6-4, 7-6 (0) in the french open final.
document.title: china gets a major champion: li na wins the french open
lines_and_colors: china's long wait for a grand slam champion ended saturday when li na beat francesca schiavone 6-4, 7-6 (0) in the french open final.
